summary: Applies a kernel to compute pixel-wise values
description: Applies a focal operation based on a weighted kernel to each value of the specified dimensions in the data cube.

kernel.description: The kernel to be applied on the data cube. The kernel has to be as many dimensions as the data cube has dimensions.

items.description: Usually a multi-dimensional array of numbers.

factor.description:
A factor that is multiplied to each value computed by the focal operation.

This is a shortcut for explicitly multiplying each value by a factor afterwards, which is often required for some kernel-based algorithms such as the Gaussian blur.

returns.description: A data cube with the newly computed values. The resolution, cardinality and the number of dimensions are the same as for the original data cube.
